name: Doors of Life
description:
Shattered pieces of someone that was never complete

Doors of Life is a single-player action adventure game, for PC and Consoles, where you take control of a broken character in a journey through their subconscious in search of their missing pieces. In their subconscious there are a lot of doors to explore each with its own world and piece of the character to obtain. There are also a lot of mischievous characters, some wanting to help you, others wanting to break you.

Will you be able to fight yourself and be complete again?

  • A gameplay focused, single-player game with a unique, interesting and relatable narrative
  • A fun and fast-paced melee combat with tons of difficult enemies and bosses to defeat
  • Unique puzzles for the player to progress through
  • A playstyle that rewards player skill
  • A fantasy theme world that has a lot of real life and personal inspirations that resonates with the player
  • The gameplay carries a big message and a part of the story
Controls (Keyboard and Xbox Controller)

Movement - Arrow Keys, Left Stick or D-Pad

Attack - Z or X Button

Interact/Push - X or A Button

Pause - Tab Key or Start Button
